short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the rank of the pages in the Google search results when viewing a Google Search Engine Result Page (SERP).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Rank Display - See Google Rankings Instantly

What is Google Rank Display?

Google Rank Display is a lightweight Chrome Extension that adds a clear, visible ranking number to each Google search result. It's designed for SEO professionals, digital marketers, and anyone who wants to see search result positions quickly and easily.

Key Features:

🏷️ Instant Rank Visibility: Each Google search result shows its position number directly beside it.
🔄 Real-Time Updates: Rankings update dynamically with each new search query.
🎨 Seamless Integration: The extension's design blends perfectly with Google's search results for an unobtrusive experience.
🔍 Accurate Tracking: Avoids counting nested sitelinks and 'People Also Ask' sections for precise rank identification.
🛠️ Easy to Use: No configuration needed. Just install and start browsing.
Why SERP Rank Display?
